Text:
I recieved a request to upload the MechWarrior 2 Trilogy. The other 2 are on their way.

Thanks,
DOS-Carey

Thanks Carey! I've been looking for this game for years. Thankfully someone finally uploaded it! Checked with AVG 2011 and seems clean. I will give it a try and see if I can get it to run on my PC. Thanks again!
Worked like a charm!!! Big thanks to you. I haven't played that game in 13 years... Brings back memories. Thanks again!
Okay, so I did everything in the instructions but I can't access the "Sound Configuration Utility". PLEASE HELP!
